tldr: A child in Normandy, born with a monstrous size and strength beyond its age, is studied by M. Geoffroy and M. Le Cat. The child, three years and two months old, has a large neck, broad chest, and an enlarged belly. It also has hair around its private parts and a penis that grows from three to six inches during erections. The child's unusual physical traits and strength are documented in a letter to Sir Hans Sloane.
